sense.def:
Kadar človek
cries
, mu iz oči tečejo solze, ker je nesrečen ali ranjen.

seg.quote: I think she had had a good cry.

sense.def:
To cry something
pomeni nekaj na glas zakričati ali reči.

seg.quote: I heard a cry for help.
Claud let out a cry of horror.

sense.def:
Glasen ptičji klic lahko opišemo kot
a cry
.

seg.quote: A sea bird flapped upwards with a hoarse cry.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a far cry from something else
, je zelo različno od nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: The tropical grasslands are a far cry from the lush green pastures of Ireland.

sense.def:
To cry off
pomeni skleniti, da ne bomo storili nečesa, za kar smo se že dogovorili;

seg.quote: I'm afraid I cried off at the last moment.

sense.def:
To cry out
pomeni glasno zaklicati ali kaj reči, na primer zato, ker smo zaskrbljeni ali preplašeni.

seg.quote: I heard Mary cry out in fright.
‘Father! You must stop that!’ he suddenly cried out.

sense.def:
Kadar neka stvar
is crying out for another
, zelo potrebuje drugo.

seg.quote: There is a vast surplus of workers crying out for employment.
